title: Welcome to the (Re)Entering Mentoring 2025 Workshop Series
text:
This is our second iteration of offering (Re)Entering Mentoring as an online webinar series for the LTER network. Thank you so much for joining us, and committing some time this semester to mentorship. We are really looking forward to working and growing with you.
This workshop series is based on materials developed by: Center for the Improvement of Mentored Experiences in Research (CIMER) Wisconsin Center for Educational Research, University of Wisconsin-Madison 1025 W. Johnson Street, Madison, WI 53705; (608) 265-2419 cimer@wcer.wisc.edu; cimerproject.org.
We have created this website to serve as a hub for information during and after the series, and more information will be added in the next two weeks.



All sessions begin at 10am PT / 1pm ET and end at 11:30am PT / 2:30pm ET





Date
Topic




April 17, 2025
Module 1: Aligning expectations


April 24, 2025
Module 2: Communication/Mentoring challenges


May 1, 2025
Module 3: Assessing understanding


May 7, 2025
Module 4: Mentoring Across Difference









Entering Mentoring 2025 Cohort Google Group – Visit the link above to change your group settings, or to request access for a different email address.
Group Introductions Document –Please add your information here!
Please reach out to Molly Phillips if you have any questions or issues.
